import React from "react"; import { Button, Col, Image } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { translate, t } from "react-multi-lang"; import { isMobile } from "react-device-detect"; const ChatUserList = (props) => { const { chatUsers } = props; return (

{t("messages")}

{t("recent")}

{chatUsers.users.map((chatUser, index) => (
props.changeUser(event, chatUser, index) } >
{chatUser.to_displayname} @{chatUser.to_username}
{chatUser.message}
{chatUser.time_formatted}
))}
); }; export default translate(ChatUserList);
